name: Get Wrecked (aobatake1515)
description:
How to play: Try to get the ball up to speed by spinning it around the player and using momentum to make it faster. Once it's up to speed, hold the spin button "X" to keep its momentum as you mow down enemies. The ball will speed up as you spin it, but it will lose speed when hitting enemies so make sure to re-spin it if it gets to slow.  You can also throw the ball with the throw button "Z" to hurl it at enemies from afar, and press either "X" or "Z" to bring it back in. Hitting the walls with enough force can cause it to weaken and eventually break. 

Controls:

Move: player follows the cursor

Spin ball: hold "X"

Throw ball: hold "Z", aim and release

*If the button controls aren't working, click on the game once
